[●▐ Encounter Pokemon #ID ▌●]
20000000
[How to Use (Encounter Pokemon #ID)]
[Enable (Encounter MOD) Cheat first]
[Method 1: Enable any Encounter Pokemon #XXXX cheat]
[Walk away from where you activated cheat]
[search around you for new spawned Pokemons]
[can tell if it's working by opening your (X) menu, your koraidon/miraridon will change to what the encounter is spawning]
[Turn (OFF)(Encounter Mod) and Enable (Default Encounter)]
[to restore original Pokemons in the map]

[●▐ Encounter Item #ID ▌●]
20000000
[How to Use Item Encounter Cheats]
[Enable (Encounter MOD) cheat first]
[Method 1: Enable any Item cheat like Master Ball]
[Walk away from where you activated cheat]
[search around you for a spawned Evee Pokemons]

[Methood 2: Go inside your House or GYM and back out]
[Find Evee Pokemon near you, Catch it or Steal its held item]
[Note: its  50/50 chance the pokemon you encounter will have the item you want]
[Turn OFF E(ncounter Mod) and Enable (Encounter Item OFF) to restore original Effect]

[❖ How to Use (Move Modifier) ❖]
20000000
[Read: Move ID Names (v1.0.1).txt (for HEX ID list)]
00000000 00000000 00000000
[Enter Battle, enable code, use your first move]
00000000 00000000 00000000
[Use (Run away) check New Moves in (summary screen)]
00000000 00000000 00000000
[save your Game and use (Disable Move Modifier Code)]
00000000 00000000 00000000
[WWW = First Move]
[XXX = Second Move]
[YYY = Third Move]
[ZZZ = Fourth Move]
